mapper.insert: insert into tbl_inyeon_freply(freply_num,fboard_num,fb_reply_cont,fb_reply_date,email,del_ck) values(fre_seq.nextval,#{fboard_num},#{fb_reply_cont},sysdate,(select email from tbl_inyeon_user where email=#{email}),1)
insert into tbl_inyeon_freply values(fre_seq.nextval,#{fboard_num},#{fb_reply_cont},sysdate,#{fb_reply_reply_name},#{fb_reply_reply_cont},(select email from tbl_inyeon_user where email=#{email}),1)
mapper.select: select tbl_inyeon_freply.freply_num,tbl_inyeon_freply.del_ck,tbl_inyeon_freply.fb_reply_cont,tbl_inyeon_freply.fb_reply_date,tbl_inyeon_user.email,tbl_inyeon_user.name,tbl_inyeon_freply.fb_reply_reply_name,tbl_inyeon_freply.fb_reply_reply_cont from tbl_inyeon_freply inner join tbl_inyeon_user on tbl_inyeon_freply.email=tbl_inyeon_user.email where tbl_inyeon_freply.fboard_num=#{fb_num} order by tbl_inyeon_freply.freply_num asc

select tbl_inyeon_freply.freply_num,tbl_inyeon_freply.del_ck,tbl_inyeon_freply.fb_reply_cont,tbl_inyeon_freply.fb_reply_date,tbl_inyeon_user.email,tbl_inyeon_user.name,tbl_inyeon_freply.fb_reply_reply_name,tbl_inyeon_freply.fb_reply_reply_cont from tbl_inyeon_freply inner join tbl_inyeon_user on tbl_inyeon_freply.email=tbl_inyeon_user.email where tbl_inyeon_freply.fboard_num=#{fb_num} order by tbl_inyeon_freply.freply_num desc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_inyeon_freply WHERE fboard_num = #{fb_num}
mapper.update: update tbl_inyeon_freply set del_ck=0 where freply_num=#{freply_num}
update tbl_inyeon_freply set fb_reply_cont=#{fb_reply_cont} where freply_num=#{freply_num}
